duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative service support to customers, addressing billing, policy changes, and discounts.
Communicate with internal and external customers about underwriting guidelines, policies, and marketing initiatives.
Proactively share knowledge to reduce customer effort and provide a positive customer experience.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve intermediate policy and account related questions from customers.
Identify and suggest innovative process changes to support business practices.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four year college degree preferred.
